about_the_game:
It is not known who he was before. He doesn't even remember his name. He has been in the dungeon of King Puppetuppon for many years. Was he a noble war, a great Mage, or maybe a root merchant? We probably will never know. It is so terrifying that its appearance paralyzes enemies and sometimes it is very difficult to distinguish it from a doll without life. Will we know the stories of this skeleton? Who knows.

This product is an addition content to BeatMe! It contains one playable character with unique skills and playstyle.

Explore new posibilities, with new characters in this lovely party brawler!

name: Puppetonia Tournament - SKELETON

subs.option_text: Beat Me! - Puppetonia Tournament - SKELETON - $2.99 $1.49 USD

short_description: Skeleton - Terrifying puppet. He has been in the dungeon of King Puppetuppon for many years.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
